verbs.description: red sox beat dodgers in game 5 to [V: win] [ARG1: world series title] the boston red sox won their fourth world series championship in 15 years beating the los angeles dodgers 5 - 1 in game 5 sunday night behind david price pitching and steve pearce power alex cora became the first manager from puerto rico to guide a team to the title dodgers los angeles dodgers alex cora boston red sox steve pearce los angeles sox dodger stadium world series
